com.Leo.Game

类 BombHero

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Leo.Game.BombHero

  • public class BombHero
extends java.lang.Object
    Hero explosion

    When the bullet is fired onto the tank, it will have an explosion effect.

    从以下版本开始:
    2018.11.20
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    Leo

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BombHero

        public BombHero(int x,
                int y,
                BattleField battleField)
        Explosion effect position constructor
        参数:
        x - The abscissa of the top left of the explosion image
        y - The ordinate of the top left of the explosion image
        battleField - battlefield

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Explosion effect generation method

        Determine the survival status of the explosion image (if (!live)), if not, remove the explosion image

        Determine if it is the last explosion image if (step == imgs.length), and if so, change the inventory status of the exploded image (live = false) , and reset (step = 0), and finally return

        If the explosion image survives, draw the explosion image g.drawImage(imgs[step], x, y, null) and continue to the next (step++) (continuous explosion image)

        参数:
        g - Brush tool
